name: unity-wallet
description: Unity Wallet (Creat React Native + React Native Web + Electron)

scripts.desktop: concurrently "cross-env BROWSER=none yarn web" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && electron ."
scripts.desktop-build: concurrently "rm -rf build && yarn web-build" "wait-on build/index.html && npx electron-builder -mwl --publish never"
scripts.desktop-build-mac: concurrently "rm -rf build && yarn web-build" "wait-on build/index.html && npx electron-builder -m --publish never"
scripts.desktop-build-win: concurrently "rm -rf build && yarn web-build" "wait-on build/index.html && npx electron-builder -w --publish never"
scripts.desktop-build-linux: concurrently "rm -rf build && yarn web-build" "wait-on build/index.html && npx electron-builder -l --publish never"
scripts.desktop-deploy: concurrently "rm -rf build && yarn web-build" "wait-on build/index.html && npx electron-builder -mwl --publish always"
scripts.desktop-deploy-mac: concurrently "rm -rf build && yarn web-build" "wait-on build/index.html && npx electron-builder -m --publish always"
scripts.desktop-deploy-win: concurrently "rm -rf build && yarn web-build" "wait-on build/index.html && npx electron-builder -w --publish always"
scripts.desktop-deploy-linux: concurrently "rm -rf build && yarn web-build" "wait-on build/index.html && npx electron-builder -l --publish always"
